INSERT INTO weixin_tb_event_location_select ( TO_USER_NAME, FROM_USER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, MSG_TYPE, EVENT, EVENT_KEY, LOCATION_X, LOCATION_Y, SCALE, LABEL, POI_NAME, AGENT_ID ) VALUES ( #toUserName:VARCHAR#, #fromUserName:VARCHAR#, #createTime:NUMBER#, #msgType:VARCHAR#, #event:VARCHAR#, #eventKey:VARCHAR#, #locationX:VARCHAR#, #locationY:VARCHAR#, #scale:VARCHAR#, #label:VARCHAR#, #poiName:VARCHAR#, #agentId:NUMBER# )
